title: Pentagon prepared briefing for Musk on top secret U.S. weapons for China war
summary: Pentagon aides were preparing to brief Elon Musk on 29 ultra-classified weapons programs tied to a possible war with China–before the brief was eventually scrapped at the last minute over ethics concerns
